item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Théophile Gautier
item.description: "J'aime la folle cruauté des chimères qu'on apprivoise." -- Théophile Gautier

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Richard Brautigan
item.description: "Sometimes life is merely a matter of coffee and whatever intimacy a cup of coffee affords." -- Richard Brautigan

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Italo Calvino
item.description: "In the shop window you have promptly identified the cover with the title you were looking for. Following this visual trail, you have forced your way through the shop past the thick barricade of Books You Haven't Read, which are frowning at you from the tables and shelves, trying to cow you...And thus you pass the outer girdle of ramparts, but then you are attacked by the infantry of Books That If You Had More Than One Life You Would Certainly Also Read But Unfortunately Your Days Are Numbered. With a rapid maneuver you bypass them and move into the phalanxes of the Books You Mean To Read But There Are Others You Must Read First, the Books Too Expensive Now And You'll Wait Till They're Remaindered, the Books ditto When They Come Out in Paperback, Books You Can Borrow From Somebody, Books That Everybody's Read So It's As If You Had Read Them, Too. " -- Italo Calvino

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Italo Calvino
item.description: "If one wanted to depict the whole thing graphically, every episode, with its climax, would require a three-dimensional, or, rather, no model: every experience is unrepeatable. What makes lovemaking and reading resemble each other most is that within both of them times and spaces open, different from measurable time and space." -- Italo Calvino

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Italo Calvino
item.description: "A classic is a book that has never finished saying what it has to say." -- Italo Calvino

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Peter Handke
item.description: "No one can be trusted who isn't thrilled with himself at least now and then." -- Peter Handke

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "All of old. Nothing else ever. Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "You have wakened not out of sleep, but into a prior dream, and that dream lies within another, and so on, to infinity, which is the number of grains of sand. The path that you are to take is endless, and you will die before you have truly awakened." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Raymond Chandler
item.description: "Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it. " -- Raymond Chandler

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "You cannot find peace by avoiding life." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by H. P. Lovercraft
item.description: "The most merciful thing in the world, I think, is the inability of the human mind to correlate all its contents. We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of the infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far." -- H. P. Lovercraft

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Herman Melville
item.description: "I try all things, I achieve what I can." -- Herman Melville

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "A book must be the axe for the frozen sea within us." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Émile Zola
item.description: "If you ask me what I came to do in this world, I, an artist, will answer you: I am here to live out loud." -- Émile Zola

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Joseph Conrad
item.description: "We live as we dream--alone...." -- Joseph Conrad

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Victor hugo
item.description: "Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent" -- Victor hugo

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Honoré de Balzac
item.description: "Solitude is fine but you need someone to tell that solitude is fine." -- Honoré de Balzac

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The difference between the right word and the almost right word is the difference between lightning and a lightning bug." -- Mark Twain

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: TeaButterfly add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa
